# posthog_role (Resource)

Manages a role within a PostHog organization.

~> **Enterprise Feature:** Role-based access control (RBAC) requires a PostHog Enterprise plan. See [Access Control documentation](https://posthog.com/docs/settings/access-control) for more details.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a role for the Engineering team
resource "posthog_role" "engineering" {
  organization_id = "your-organization-uuid"
  name            = "Engineering"
}

# Create a role for the Support team
resource "posthog_role" "support" {
  organization_id = "your-organization-uuid"
  name            = "Support"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role.

### Optional

- `organization_id` (String) Organization ID for this resource. Overrides the provider-level organization_id.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the role was created.
- `created_by` (String) UUID of the user who created the role.
- `id` (String) The UUID of the role.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
# Import a role using the format: organization_id/role_id
terraform import posthog_role.engineering your-organization-uuid/your-role-uuid
```
